label: OrganizationalCertification
comment: The process of certifying organizational performance or qualification requirements as stipulated in regulations.

objectProperties.comment: A referenced standard applicable to this organizational certification.
An assertion, expressed as text, for this organizational certification.
The code specifying the assertion, such as a claim that an organization does not practise child labour, of this organizational certification.
A referenced location related to this organizational certification.
An agency, expressed as text, responsible for this organizational certification.
A sustainability assertion specified for this organizational certification.
A standard, expressed as text, used for this organizational certification.
